entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, mentioned as being tied to a headstone.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The antagonist of the story, described as having long white fingers and red eyes.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: A character who is mentioned as lying twitching and bleeding on the ground.

entities.name: the death eaters
entities.description: A group of people who are not explicitly described in this passage but are mentioned as being associated with Voldemort.

relationships.description: Voldemort points his wand at Wormtail, lifting him off the ground and throwing him against a headstone.
Voldemort ignores Harry while examining his own body and interacting with Wormtail.
